citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
During a focused inspection one dog, Philippe; a 12-year-old male Toy Poodle, (m/c# 0A01670943), was found to still be
excessively matted all over. This included around his neck, down his back and around his legs. Matted hair can result in
skin problems, can be painful, and can compromise the hair’s ability to provide protection from the heat or cold. The
licensee must remove the matted hair from Philippe and must establish an effective program of haircoat maintenance.
Dental disease is still present from inspection on April 3, 2024, however, licensee has discussed this with the attending
veterinarian and a treatment plan has been put in place.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Direct Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
During a focused inspection one dog, Philippe; a 12-year-old male Toy Poodle, (m/c# 0A01670943), was found to still be 
excessively matted all over. This included around his neck, down his back and around his legs. Matted hair can result in 
skin problems, can be painful, and can compromise the hair’s ability to provide protection from the heat or cold. The 
licensee must remove the matted hair from Philippe and must establish an effective program of haircoat maintenance. 
 
 
Dental disease is still present from inspection on April 3, 2024, however, licensee has discussed this with the attending 
veterinarian and a treatment plan has been put in place. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
 n
